title: Voice-Activated Commands
description: Older adults should be able to use voice commands to interact with ALFRED for basic tasks such as setting reminders, checking the weather, or calling family members.
acceptanceCriteria: ALFRED should accurately interpret and respond to voice commands.
Voice commands should be simple and easy to remember.

title: Patient Privacy Control
description: Patients must have full control over what health data is shared with caregivers and medical staff.
acceptanceCriteria: The system allows patients to set privacy preferences for each caregiver.
Only authorized caregivers have access to sensitive health data.
